original_text: Moses gave Gad these towns in the valley: Beth Haram, Beth Nimrah, Succoth and Zaphon. He gave them the rest of the land of Sihon, king of Heshbon. This was on the east side of the Jordan River, up to the edge of the sea of Galilee.
korean_text: 골짜기에 있는 벧 하람과 벧니므라와 숙곳과 사본 곧 헤스본 왕 시혼의 나라의 남은 땅 요단과 그 강 가에서부터 요단 동쪽 긴네렛 바다의 끝까지라

sentences.original_text: Moses gave Gad these towns in the valley
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 갓에게 이 골짜기의 마을들을 주었으니

sentences.original_text: Beth Haram, Beth Nimrah, Succoth and Zaphon
He gave them the rest of the land of Sihon
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들에게 시혼의 남은 땅을 주었으니

sentences.original_text: This was on the east side of the Jordan River
up to the edge of the sea of Galilee
